EmailTemplate.name: 2013 Webinars.MyAerospace Revamp - Invitation (External)
EmailTemplate.subject: MyAerospace.com Redesign, Coming Soon
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
MyAerospace.com Revamp Live Webinar {{system.date:default=edit me}} Coming Soon! We are updating the look and feel of the MyAerospace.com website. We've collected customer feedback and we are making major improvements to the site! Simplified navigation organized around common tasks
- Previously we had over 240 links in our navigation flyouts, now we have decreased it to just under 90 - Organized by customer workflow and tasks using human factors approach. - Created a separate website highlighting Honeywell Products and Services.
Customize Your Home Page
- Quick access to the tools you use the most.
Session Dates:
Monday 21 October
- 6:30 AM (PDT) Click to register <http://pages3.honeywell.com/2013Webinars_MyAerospaceRevamp-RegistrationExternal.html?date=Mon 21 Oct 6:30 AM (PDT) US/EMEA&email={{lead.Email Address:default=edit me}}> - 9:00 AM (PDT) Click to register <http://pages3.honeywell.com/2013Webinars_MyAerospaceRevamp-RegistrationExternal.html?date=Mon 21 Oct 9:00 AM (PDT) US&email={{lead.Email Address:default=edit me}}> - 8:00 PM (PDT) Click to register <http://pages3.honeywell.com/2013Webinars_MyAerospaceRevamp-RegistrationExternal.html?date=Mon 21 Oct 8:00 PM (PDT) APAC&email={{lead.Email Address:default=edit me}}>
Wednesday 23 October
- 7:00 AM (PDT) Click to register <http://pages3.honeywell.com/2013Webinars_MyAerospaceRevamp-RegistrationExternal.html?date=Wed 23 Oct 7:00 AM (PDT) US/EMEA&email={{lead.Email Address:default=edit me}}> - 9:00 AM (PDT) Click to register <http://pages3.honeywell.com/2013Webinars_MyAerospaceRevamp-RegistrationExternal.html?date=Wed 23 Oct 9:00 AM (PDT) US&email={{lead.Email Address:default=edit me}}>
Thursday 24 October
- 9:00 AM (PDT) Click to register <http://pages3.honeywell.com/2013Webinars_MyAerospaceRevamp-RegistrationExternal.html?date=Thu 24 Oct 9:00 AM (PDT) US&email={{lead.Email Address:default=edit me}}> - 8:00 PM (PDT) Click to register <http://pages3.honeywell.com/2013Webinars_MyAerospaceRevamp-RegistrationExternal.html?date=Thu 24 OCt 8:00 PM (PDT) APAC&email={{lead.Email Address:default=edit me}}>
Presenter: Grant Humpherys <mailto:Grant.Humpherys@honeywell.com>, Honeywell Aerospace. Grant Humpherys, Customer Support Program Manager for E-Business, supporting Order Status deployment and major Portal Development. Duration: 30 Minutes Presentation, Q&A Session <http://pages3.honeywell.com/2013Webinars_MyAerospaceRevamp-RegistrationExternal.html> Click here to register for a training session today <http://pages3.honeywell.com/2013Webinars_MyAerospaceRevamp-RegistrationExternal.html>
